solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public int maxProfit(int[] prices) {--newline--            int maxCur = 0, maxSoFar = 0;--newline--            for(int i = 1; i < prices.length; i++) {--newline--                maxCur = Math.max(0, maxCur += prices[i] - prices[i-1]);--newline--                maxSoFar = Math.max(maxCur, maxSoFar);--newline--            }--newline--            return maxSoFar;--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--}
